meanings.definition: The act of making something resistant to rain.
meanings.sent1: Rainproofing is important for keeping your belongings dry during a storm.
meanings.sent2: The rainproofing of the tent ensured a dry camping experience.
meanings.sent3: The rainproofing on the umbrella saved the day during the sudden downpour.
meanings.sent4: Her meticulous rainproofing of the roof kept the house safe from leaks.
meanings.sent5: Proper rainproofing can prevent water damage to your property.

meanings.definition: The process of applying a waterproof coating to protect against rain.
meanings.sent1: The rainproofing of the jacket made it perfect for rainy days.
meanings.sent2: Rainproofing is essential for outdoor furniture to withstand the elements.
meanings.sent3: The rainproofing of the car windows made them look like mirrors in the rain.
meanings.sent4: The rainproofing of the deck made it shine like a diamond in the rain.
meanings.sent5: Rainproofing your shoes can keep your feet dry and comfortable.
